DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator to ask if the patient received pelvic radiation therapy prior to study entry.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to prior pelvic radiation therapy being administered.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:use PHOTOTHERAPY, LASER THERAPY, or ULTRAVIOLET THERAPY for therapeutic radiation with visible, laser, or ultraviolet light, respectively.

Concepts.definition: Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation.

Property.preferredDefinition: Of or pertaining to the pelvis.:Given.

Concepts.definition: Of or pertaining to the pelvis.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredName: Chronic or Associated Diseases and Exposures
ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: chronic diseases, as well as diseases and exposures associated with cancer.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or unknown.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 4-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reeves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 3/35/2016 jk removed "indeterminate" value that was added in error. 7/7/2021wz: added ALT VM name for HOPE-CARE project.

ReferenceDocuments.name: COMMENT_378
ReferenceDocuments.description: Add instruction in italics to form: (Indicate "yes" for any prior RT to the bladder, prostate, uterus, and surrounding genitourinary structures in the pelvis.)

ReferenceDocuments.name: Prior Pelvic Radiation Therapy
ReferenceDocuments.description: Prior Pelvic Radiation Therapy

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was prior radiation therapy to a large area of the pelvis

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was the patient treated previously with pelvic or extended field radiation

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Prior radiation therapy to the pelvis resulting in overlapping of radiation therapy fields per this protocol

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient received prior radiotherapy to any portion of the abdominal cavity or pelvis

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text9
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient received prior pelvic radiation therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text8
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient had any prior pelvic or abdominal radiation therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Any prior pelvic radiation

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text10
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have a history of prior whole pelvic radiation?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text11
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have a prior history of pelvic radiation?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text12
ReferenceDocuments.description: Prior radiation therapy, including brachytherapy, to the pelvis resulting in overlapping of radiation therapy fields per this protocol

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG_CRF_TEXT_1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient received any prior pelvic radiation therapy at the indicated percentage

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF Text 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient received prior radiotherapy or chemotherapy for the cancer being treated in this study?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient received previous pelvic or abdominal radiation, cytotoxic chemotherapy, or previous therapy of any kind for this malignancy

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient received previous pelvic or abdominal radiation, cytotoxic chemotherapy, or previous therapy of any kind for this malignancy or any pelvic or abdominal radiation for any prior malignancy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF_Text_13
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient had any therapeutic pelvic radiation?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 13
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient have prior radiotherapy to the abdomen or pelvis

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_eCRF_Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient received prior radiation therapy to the pelvis or abdominal cavity, PALN radiation, or previous therapy of any kind for this malignancy or pelvic, PALN, or abdominal radiation for any prior malignancy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 10
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient received radiation to greater than or equal to 50% of the pelvic area?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 100
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient received radiation to greater than or equal to 50% of the pelvis?

DataElement.changeDescription: Replace VD Therapy Ind-3 2018278v2.0 with VD ID#3506034 - Yes No Unknown Indicator  - dbw
